summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Clogston Way, from Green Lake Way to the west line of Block 3, Wallingford's Division of Green Lake Addition; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12854 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
